statements: SELECT * FROM mining_activities;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM mining_activities;
SELECT activity_date, activity_details FROM mining_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT activity_type FROM mining_activities;
SELECT * FROM mining_activities WHERE user_id = 1 AND activity_type = 'Mining';
SELECT * FROM mining_activities WHERE user_id = 1 AND activity_type = 'mining' ORDER BY activity_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM mining_activities WHERE activity_type LIKE '%ore%' ORDER BY user_id ASC, activity_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, activity_type FROM mining_activities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY user_id, activity_type
SELECT user_id, activity_type, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM mining_activities GROUP BY user_id, activity_type ORDER BY total_activities DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(DISTINCT activity_type) AS unique_activities FROM mining_activities GROUP BY user_id HAVING unique_activities >= 3 ORDER BY unique_activities DESC, user_id ASC
SELECT * FROM mining_activities WHERE miner_id = 1;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type FROM mining_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Mining';
SELECT block_height, block_hash FROM blockchain_blocks ORDER BY block_height DESC;
SELECT miner_id, COUNT(*) AS block_count FROM blockchain_blocks GROUP BY miner_id;
SELECT * FROM mining_activities JOIN blockchain_blocks ON mining_activities.block_height = blockchain_blocks.block_height;
SELECT * FROM mining_activities WHERE miner_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT activity_id, activity_type FROM mining_activities WHERE block_height > 500 GROUP BY activity_id
SELECT block_hash, prev_block_hash FROM blockchain_blocks WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY block_height ASC
SELECT miner_id, COUNT(*) AS total_blocks FROM blockchain_blocks GROUP BY miner_id HAVING total_blocks > 10
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, block_height, timestamp FROM mining_activities INNER JOIN blockchain_blocks ON mining_activities.block_height = blockchain_blocks.block_height
SELECT * FROM miners;
SELECT miner_name, mining_power FROM miners;
SELECT * FROM mining_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Mining';
SELECT activity_id, activity_date FROM mining_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT miner_name, mining_address FROM miners WHERE mining_power > 1000;
SELECT miner_name, mining_power FROM miners WHERE mining_power > 50;
SELECT activity_type, activity_date FROM mining_activities WHERE miner_id = 1001;
SELECT sender_id, recipient_id, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM miners WHERE miner_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT activity_id, miner_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM mining_activities WHERE activity_type IN ('exploration', 'extraction');
SELECT * FROM mining_activities ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, block_number, reward FROM mining_activities WHERE reward > 1000 ORDER BY reward ASC;
SELECT miner_id, COUNT(*) as num_blocks_mined FROM mining_activities GROUP BY miner_id ORDER BY num_blocks_mined DESC;
SELECT name, country, mining_power FROM miners WHERE mining_power > 100 ORDER BY name;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, block_number, miner_id, timestamp, reward FROM mining_activities WHERE block_number > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, name, country, mining_power FROM miners WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY mining_power DESC;
SELECT id, sender_id, receiver_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT block_number, prev_block_number, num_transactions, timestamp FROM blocks WHERE prev_block_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY block_number DESC;
SELECT ma.id, ma.block_number, m.name AS miner_name, ma.timestamp, ma.reward FROM mining_activities ma JOIN miners m ON ma.miner_id = m.id WHERE m.country = 'China' ORDER BY ma.timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Mining_Companies;
SELECT company_name, location FROM Mining_Companies ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT miner_name, mining_power FROM Miners WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT pool_name, total_miners, pool_fee FROM Mining_Pools WHERE total_miners > 50;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Mining_Companies WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT company_name, location FROM Mining_Companies WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT t.sender_address, t.receiver_address, t.amount, m.miner_name FROM Transactions t JOIN Miners m ON t.sender_address = m.miner_name WHERE t.amount > 100;
SELECT mp.pool_name, mp.total_miners, COUNT(m.miner_id) AS active_miners FROM Mining_Pools mp LEFT JOIN Miners m ON mp.pool_id = m.company_id GROUP BY mp.pool_name;
SELECT MAX(reward_amount) AS highest_reward, MIN(reward_amount) AS lowest_reward FROM Mining_Rewards WHERE reward_date >= '2022-01-01';
